text: Real Book is an album by bassist Steve Swallow released on the Xtra Watt label in 1994.ECM/WATT discography accessed August 25, 2016Steve Swallow catalog accessed August 25, 2016 ==Reception== Allmusic awarded the album 4 stars and the review by Rick Anderson states: "This program finds him showing off his considerable writing chops with the help of an all-star group... His focus on the upper registers and the polyester tone of his five-string bass guitar will continue to annoy those who prefer to hear the bass played dark, low and woody, but there's no denying the consistent inventiveness of his playing or the charm of these compositions". ==Track listing== All compositions by Steve Swallow. # "Bite Your Grandmother" - 4:40 # "Second Handy Motion" - 4:47 # "Wrong Together" - 5:19 # "Outfits" - 5:52 # "Thinking Out Loud" - 5:04 # "Let's Eat" - 5:38 # "Better Times" - 3:49 # "Willow" - 4:13 # "Muddy in the Bank" - 3:20 # "Ponytail" - 6:26 ==Personnel== *Steve Swallow - 5 string bass guitar *Tom Harrell - trumpet, flugelhorn *Joe Lovano - tenor saxophone *Mulgrew Miller - piano *Jack DeJohnette - drums ==References== Category:Steve Swallow albums Category:1994 albums
title: Real Book (album)
